page.title: 04B.T.REPEATER STATION CONT.
page.content: If the air gets too hot it is sprayed with cold water,if it gets too cold it is sprayed with hot water.After the air has been washed it goes up pipes and is circulated around the building. There is a master clock which keeps all the other clocks working such as the G.M.T. clock,the E.S.T.clock and the local one. There is a battery room where about 50 batteries are kept,6 of which would be needed to power a car.They are about 15" across the top and 25" long. They power the machines and lights when there is apower cut.The distance to Beaver Harbour is 2,200 nautical miles and the distance to Tuckerton is 3,500 nautical miles.
